page.title: 06WEATHER
page.content: IN DRUMBLADE WEATHER AFFECTS US QUITE A BIT. SNOW DAMAGES PIPES AND BLOCKS ROADS .IN ANY CASE IT MEANS WE CHILDREN CAN,T GET TO SCHOOL. THE SNOW ALSO CAUSES ACCIDENTS .IT CAN BE A BIG DISASTER TO FARMERS BECAUSE THEY CAN'T GET TO THE CATTLE AND SHEEP IF THERES TOO MUCH SNOW. THE GOOD THING ABOUT SNOW IS YOU GET TO SLEDGE AND GO SKIING UP AND DOWN THE FIELD AND MAKE SNOWMEN AND PLAY ABOUT IN THE SNOW. ANOTHER THING ABOUT FEEDING THE SHEEP ,IF YOU HAVE DEEP ENOUGH SNOW THE SHEEP COULD GET COVERED IN SNOW AND THEN YOU'VE GOT A DEAD SHEEP.
